job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Must Haves:</strong></p><ul><li>6+ years of experience designing, building, deploying, testing, maintaining, monitoring and owning scalable, resilient and distributed machine learning algorithms and systems.</li><li>Expertise with Machine Learning algorithms applied to Recommender Systems and Search.</li><li>Proficiency in operating machine learning solutions at scale, covering the end-to-end ML workflow.</li><li>Experience with offline experimentation and A/B testing.</li><li>Deep knowledge of ML tools and frameworks (TensorFlow, Keras, pyTorch, scikit-learn, Spark, ...).</li><li>Proficiency in programming languages such as Python or Scala.</li><li>Strong understanding of modern approaches to Recommendation or Search (GBDT, CNN, LSTM, GRU, HRNN, transformers, siamese neural networks, variational auto-encoders, ...).</li><li>Experience with at least one of Deep Learning, Contextual Multi-Armed Bandits, Reinforcement Learning, Causal Inference.</li><li>Familiarity with real-world ML systems (configuration, data collection, data verification, feature extraction, resource and process management, analytics, training, serving, validation, experimentation, monitoring).</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>Nice to Haves</strong></p><ul><li>Understanding of batch and streaming data processing techniques.</li><li>Obsession for service observability, instrumentation, monitoring and alerting.</li><li>Knowledge of AWS or similar cloud platforms.</li><li>Familiarity with CI/CD tools (CircleCI, Jenkins or similar) to automate building, testing and deployment of the ML algorithms and to manage the infrastructure (Pulumi, Terraform or CloudFormation).</li></ul>
